Package ru.practicum.ewmserver.repository

Interface RequestRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ParticipationRequest,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ParticipationRequest,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<ParticipationRequest,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<ParticipationRequest>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ParticipationRequest,Long>
public interface RequestRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<ParticipationRequest,Long>
